relatedRecords.name: Azure BootCamp Bulgaria 2020
relatedRecords.location: Microsoft Innovation Center | Sofia Tech Park | 111B, Tsarigradsko Shousse Blvd | 1784 Sofia | Bulga
relatedRecords.description:
A unique community event that will take place on August 29, 2020 for the seventh time in Bulgaria . One day deep dive class to help thousands of people get up to speed on developing Cloud Computing Applications for Microsoft Azure.
The event will be focused on technical sessions in several tracks.
